creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
we should provide a instrumentation-xconf.xsl that inserts appropriate views for
lenya parameters into the instrumentation configuration.

some samples might be:

<maintained-sample lease-duration="600000" type="maximum" description="Each
Second" instrument-name="component-manager.transient-store.references"
size="600" interval="1000"/>
<maintained-sample lease-duration="600000" type="maximum" description="Each
Second" instrument-name="transient-store.size" size="600" interval="1000"/>
<maintained-sample lease-duration="600000" type="maximum" description="Each
Second"
instrument-name="component-manager.access-controller-resolvers.composable.references"
size="600" interval="1000"/>
<maintained-sample lease-duration="600000" type="counter" description="Each
Second" instrument-name="component-manager.sitemap.gets" size="600"
interval="1000"/>
<maintained-sample lease-duration="600000" type="maximum" description="Each
Second" instrument-name="component-manager.classloader.references" size="600"
interval="1000"/>
